Oct. 10, 2009 D West Wales BBA Contest (First Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-first-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Kate Blakemore, Euphonium, Rogerstone Prizes - 1st £180, 2nd £125, 3rd £110. 4 bands competed.
Oct. 12, 2009, 5:01 p.m. July 4, 2020, 10:12 a.m.
1 Rogerstone Band Jamie Jones Music for the Common Man
2 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
3 Briton Ferry Band Christian Jenkins
4 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne
